meta.job_title: Utilization Review and Denial Management Assistant

duties_responsibilities.duty: Completes non-clinical appeal writing and coordination as directed by leadership.
Organizes and manages clinical appeal letter submissions via mail or other portals.
Assists with payroll management as directed.
Maintains clinical denial tracking and logging through Microsoft or assigned computer programs.
Coordinates or assists in the preparation of administrative reports, statistical tables, requisitions, and other data gathering for review by or signature of the Director or Manager.
Coordinates, schedules, and reserves meetings as directed.
Coordinates reimbursement expense reports as directed by leadership.
Manages and distributes incoming mail in a timely manner and coordinates outgoing mail.
Coordinates the duplication and collection of materials on a regular basis, filing masters or copies as appropriate.

Composes and types correspondence such as letters, memoranda, policies, procedures, reports, etc. from notes, drafts in an accurate, neat and timely manner as assigned and proof reads for accuracy prior to submittal or distribution.
Accurately records and transcribes meeting minutes as directed. Minutes are completed within a timely manner and stored in an accessible location.
Maintains appropriate records and establishes filing system to ensure the expeditious retrieval so that Director, Manager and staff can accomplish their responsibilities.
